solution_line_template: Lara can bake {rows_per_tray} x {cookies_per_row} = <<{rows_per_tray}*{cookies_per_row}={cookies_per_tray}>>{cookies_per_tray} cookies in one tray.
So, Lara is baking a total of {cookies_per_tray} x {num_trays} = <<{cookies_per_tray}*{num_trays}={total_cookies}>>{total_cookies} cookies.
